News.headline: Jakub Berkowicz Extends Loan Deal
News.short_description: Forward Jakub Berkowicz has extended his loan deal with Barkingside until the end of the season
News.description:
Jakub Berkowicz has extended his loan deal with Essex Senior League side Barkingside until 10th May 2017. 

The forward who has spent the first half of the season with the Essex side has made six apperances for the club so far this season, scoring three goals. 

Jakub Berkowicz joined the Daggers in February 2016 after impressing for the Barking & Dagenham College Football Academy, then going onto joining the Daggers Academy.
